name: Moonshot (itch) (Serpent7776)
description:
Dodge all asteroids, collect bonuses and escape from the Moon by reaching required distance in one run.

Controls:

Rocket automatically moves up and down. You can only change direction it moves.
Up, k, x - make rocket move up
Down, j, z - make rocket move down
Space - start next run

Upgrades:

There are three upgrades available in the game:
- more fuel so the run can last longer
- acceleration to make rocket gain more speed faster
- durability to lose less speed on asteroid impact

Credits:

Serpent7776: programming, game mechanics tweaks, sounds
JMR: game concept, graphics, testing
Igal: sounds
pawles22: music, Listen to it here

Backstory poem:

Looking beyond the horizon

and deep within,
dreaming of the shooting stars
travelling to the lands far away.

But the color blind earthbounds
made the door shut
to watch the world
only through the glass.

And so the journey start,
and so is moving so fast,
and so is moving so far,
far, away to some other place.

Thus went forth,
thus took off,
thus was ...

Moonshot

Is there a way to come back?

...
